Site-visit to SMK Taman Impian Emas
===================================

by [attpic](https://fke.utm.my/author/attpic/ "Posts by attpic")
 | Jan 15, 2017 | [ATT](https://fke.utm.my/category/att/)

Our members, Dr Nurzal Effiyana Ghazali and Dr Muhammad Ariff Baharudin, together with collaboration members from other groups; Dr Jasrul Jamani Jamian (PERG), Dr Osman Ayop (ARFMRG), Dr Amri Md Yunus and Dr Nurul Adilla Mohd Subha (ACRG), have site-visited SMK Impian Emas to hear our their problems and present some ideas on how to solve those problems.

This is the first step for this project, in order to clarify the main problems and to collect information on the target location for the project implementation.

![15936898_1081648518630871_718332310144075841_o](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/15936898_1081648518630871_718332310144075841_o.jpg) ![15994499_1081648515297538_5444336416294797608_o](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/15994499_1081648515297538_5444336416294797608_o.jpg)
